summary: Changed the enchatments for the Nightingale Set to be more apropriated for a highly trained sneaker.
descriptionHtml:
Changed the enchatments for the Nightingale Set to be more apropriated for a highly trained sneaker.

I was thinking myself, this set is cool and strong, but the enchantments aren\'t that good. So let\'s see: The thieves venerates Nocturnal, so they\'ll receive her blessing (specially when someone turns into a Nightingale), but they can\'t lose the enchantments of their own armor because they\'re thieves and a Nightingale used to be a sneaker. Why don\'t just combine the enchantments? So I did this mod and changed some things.

Notes: All the new items have a \"(NEW)\" after the name. Use the console to get them. They can be destroyed to learn the enchantment.

Hope you like it ;).
author: KingzBR
